title: What are modern comforts people could live without and still be happy? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of them. Some great yogis have spent many years foraging for food and living in caves in the pursuit of Divine bliss, and found it. To the extent that we rely on modern comforts to deliver "happiness" to us, we will not find it because happiness is never external. It is not inherent to leisure, convenience or wealth — as we can easily see by witnessing the various miseries of the privileged classes. Joy lies within. It is our natural state; our brains have simply been conditioned to to believe otherwise.

Pull top cans. Cardboard and glass containers instead of plastic. Automatic car windows. Escalators. People moving sidewalks in airports. Speed setting auto control in cars. Women's high heel & spike foot wear. Automatic ice makers in refrigerator s. (I was tempted to say, tv remotes! But after thinking about it. Nop, can't live Without my remotes!!!!)
